tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    mechanic_name VARCHAR(255),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    inspection_passed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_inspections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleMaintenanceRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleInspections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceAndSafety (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  make VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  year INT,
  VIN VARCHAR(17)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  PASS BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
  compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecord (RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY,
VehicleID INT,
ServiceType VARCHAR(50),
ServiceDate DATE,
ServiceCost DECIMAL,
FOREIGN KEY (VehicleID) REFERENCES Vehicle(VehicleID)
);

CREATE TABLE InspectionRecord (InspectionID INT PRIMARY KEY,
VehicleID INT,
InspectionDate DATE,
InspectorName VARCHAR(50),
PassOrFail BOOLEAN,
FOREIGN KEY (VehicleID) REFERENCES Vehicle(VehicleID)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceEmployee (MaintenanceEmployeeID INT PRIMARY KEY,
MaintenanceRecordID INT,
EmployeeID INT,
HoursWorked DECIMAL,
FOREIGN KEY (MaintenanceRecordID) REFERENCES MaintenanceRecord(RecordID),
FOREIGN KEY (EmployeeID) REFERENCES Employee(EmployeeID)
);
